name: bootyprint
description: A lightweight Bootstrap alternative designed specifically for WeasyPrint

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.demo: python -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && npm run build && python -m pip install weasyprint && weasyprint -v demo/demo.html demo/demo.pdf && weasyprint -v demo/css-variables-guide.html demo/css-variables-guide.pdf
